title: Unable to save edited portrait mode pictures from Pixel 3
content:
Most of the beautiful pictures taken of my daughter at her kindergarten graduation are gone! 

Common attributes
1. Backup and sync was disabled.
2. Pictures taken in portrait mode.
3. Pictures edited - color, depth, etc.
4. Edited photos provided only a save as option.
5. With backup enabled, these edited photos did not sync. Error message stated 'file too big or file type unknown'.

Photos remained on device for 4 nights, but are now completely missing! Gone from my favorites, my albums, photos on device folder...WTF google!
